name: beefree-sdk-examples
description: Collection of Beefree SDK example projects

scripts.start:commenting: yarn install --check-files && cd commenting-example && yarn install --check-files && cd ../secure-auth-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd commenting-example && yarn start" "cd secure-auth-example && yarn server:dev" --names "commenting,auth-server" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.start:custom-css: yarn install --check-files && cd custom-css-example && yarn install --check-files && cd ../secure-auth-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd custom-css-example && yarn start" "cd secure-auth-example && yarn server:dev" --names "custom-css,auth-server" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.start:autosave: yarn install --check-files && cd auto-save-template-versioning && yarn install --check-files && cd ../secure-auth-example && yarn install --check-files && cd .. && concurrently "cd auto-save-template-versioning && yarn dev" "cd secure-auth-example && yarn server:dev" --names "autosave,auth-server" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta"
scripts.start:template-pdf: yarn install --check-files && cd template-export-pdf-example && yarn install --check-files && yarn dev

author: Beefree
